section.title: WebServerManager Class Reference

para.para: Class for managing the web server.

section.section:
Detailed Description
Class for managing the web server.
Loads the HTML pages, handles the requests, and sends the responses. This class manages the connection to Wi-Fi networks and serves web pages to clients. It also handles temperature data and provides various endpoints for interacting with the web server.
Parameters
ssid
- SSID of the primary Wi-Fi network
password
- Password of the primary Wi-Fi network
second_ssid
- SSID of the secondary Wi-Fi network
second_password
- Password of the secondary Wi-Fi network
The documentation for this class was generated from the following file: lib/WebInterface/WebServerManager.hpp
